lead_paragraph: Taking the 2019 Rugby World Cup to Japan was a "small risk" but World Rugby chief Bill Beaumont is confident the country will engage its experience from hosting previous international sporting events to make it a commercial success.

headline.print_headline: Beaumont Confident Japan Can Drive World Cup Ticket Sales
headline.main: Beaumont Confident Japan Can Drive World Cup Ticket Sales

snippet: Taking the 2019 Rugby World Cup to Japan was a "small risk" but World Rugby chief Bill Beaumont is confident the country will engage its experience from hosting previous international sporting events to make it a commercial success....
